meanings: Noun (무엇의 작동 과정이나 사용법에 대한 시범) 설명

vlive.korean: 도겸아 보여줘, 쟤가 모르니까 - 시범을 또... DK, show him. He doesn't understand. - A demonstration... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 9595
vlive.english: DK, show him. He doesn't understand. - A demonstration...

vlive.korean: 제업이의 마샬아츠 어떻게 보셨어요? 와~ 너무 멋있었죠? What did you think of Je Up's martial arts demonstration? Wasn't it incredible? 듣기 View video IMFACT : [Full] IMFACT x mini CONCERT Ep 24.+1
vlive.english: What did you think of Je Up's martial arts demonstration? Wasn't it incredible?

vlive.korean: [어여쁜 블러셔 발색 직접 보여드릴게요] 제가 볼에 살짝 해볼게요. [I'll show you how to the blush glides on] Let me give you a little demonstration. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라> 동시생중계
vlive.english: [I'll show you how to the blush glides on] Let me give you a little demonstration.

vlive.korean: 시연회 준비하세요. Prepare a demonstration. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '긴장백배 복불복특집'
제가 시범을 보여줄게요. I'll show you two a demonstration. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : Global Working Tour in Portugal EP.3
vlive.english: I'll show you two a demonstration.

examples.korean: The demonstration escalated into a pitched battle with the police. 발음듣기 시위는 경찰과의 총력전으로 치달았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The demonstration escalated into a pitched battle with the police. 발음

examples.korean: Demonstrations were held as a gesture of solidarity with the hunger strikers. 발음듣기 단식 투쟁을 벌이는 사람들에 대한 연대의 표시로 시위들이 벌어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Demonstrations were held as a gesture of solidarity with the hunger strikers. 발음

examples.korean: The demonstration passed off peacefully. 발음듣기 그 시위는 평화적으로 이뤄졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The demonstration passed off peacefully. 발음

examples.korean: The demonstration passed off without incident. 발음듣기 그 시위는 아무 사건 없이 지나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The demonstration passed off without incident. 발음

examples.korean: Lectures will be interspersed with practical demonstrations. 발음듣기 강의 사이사이에 실습이 들어가게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lectures will be interspersed with practical demonstrations. 발음
